metadata.name: Fear
metadata.description:
Only three things are needed for true happiness in this world: - love truly and to the end, - to believe even when the mind says that it makes no sense, - and to hope when there is only darkness and continuous violence around, to hope in spite of everything ... 

These three things fill life with meaning and give strength to LIVE. Live truly. Not only for themselves but above all for others, not afraid of their wounds to live on for others, giving them life ...
